title: Seedling
summaries: The Seedling is a Hardmode, post-Plantera pet-summoning item that spawns a Pet Sapling to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, it will sprout leaflets from its arms and use them as makeshift wings to fly towards them. The Seedling has a 1/20 (5%) / 1/15 (6.67%) chance of being dropped by Plantera.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
